snippet: Geoff Rusack and his wife, Alison Wrigley Rusack, seem determined to wrestle unique wines from the soils of Santa Catalina Island.
abstract: Geoff Rusack and his wife, Alison Wrigley, seem determined to wrestle unique wines from the soils of Santa Catalina Island, California; island may be among world’s most challenging vineyards, with salty soil and over-the-top costs for transporting grapes to the winery.
lead_paragraph: Geoff Rusack and his wife, Alison Wrigley Rusack, seem determined to wrestle unique wines from the soils of Santa Catalina Island.

headline.seo: On Santa Catalina Island, a Winemaking Couple’s Costly Pursuit
headline.main: An Island Vineyard, the Hard Way
headline.print_headline: An Island Vineyard, the Hard Way
